title: Acceleration
descript: Acceleration is a derived vector magnitude that indicates the variation in speed per unit of time.

title: Gravity
descript: It is a natural phenomenon by which objects and fields of matter endowed with mass or energy are attracted to each other.

title: Mass
descript: Physical quantity that expresses the amount of matter in a body, measured by its inertia, and whose unit in the international system is the kilogram (kg).
